source: United Way of Lake and Sumter Counties

resources.name: Mission United Lake & Sumter
resources.org_name: United Way of Lake and Sumter Counties
resources.description: Mission United Lake & Sumter connects veterans and their families to supportive services and resources in Lake and Sumter Counties. Services include employment assistance, housing support, benefits navigation, and connection to community programs.
resources.eligibility: Veterans, active-duty service members, and their families in Lake and Sumter Counties, Florida.
